Package renderer

package renderer
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Camera
    class of camera helps construct rays through view plane pixels and find intersections it also implements depth of field and jagged edges improvements from part 8 as well as multi-threading and adaptive super-sampling from part 9
    ImageWriter
    Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
    ImageWriterTest
    Unit tests for renderer.ImageWriter class
    RayTracerBase
    class RayTracerBase is the parent class to RayTracerBasic and as the basic functions for ray tracing
    RayTracerBasic
    class RayTracerBasic used for finding the color for pixels
    ReflectionRefractionTests
    Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
    RenderTests
    Test rendering a basic image
    ShadowTests
    Testing basic shadows
    TeapotTest
    Test rendering an image
    testCameraRayIntersectionsIntegration
    test method for constructRay function
